title: ALKA +
long_description: ALKA + prevents pH fluctuations and helps to keep pool water perfectly balanced to maximize the efficiency of sanitizers. Balancing alkalinity will also increase swimmer comfort and protect pool equipment. ALKA+ alsoraises the pH in water.
short_description: BENEFITS Stabilizes pH fluctuations Increases swimmer comfort FORMATS 2 kg, 4 kg, 8 kg and 25 kg

characteristics.title: Recommended levels
characteristics.text: The recommended alkalinity level is 80 to 120 ppm when using a chlorine sanitizer and 100 to 120 ppm when using a bromine sanitizer. Levels are determined with a test kit.

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Slowly sprinkle ALKA + onto the surface of the water while walking all around the pool, or add it in the skimmer basket.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Check water alkalinity every two weeks with a test kit. Make any necessary adjustments according to the application method and recommended dosage. Wait 20 minutes before entering the pool after adding the product.

dosage.specifications: To raise total alkalinity by 10 ppm, add 168 g of ALKA + per 10,000 L of pool water.

columns.name: POOL SIZE
rows: TO RAISE TOTAL ALKALINITY  BY 10 ppm

warning: DO NOT apply the product when people are in the pool.
